casebody.data:
STATE
v.
POPE. No. COA08-440. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 18, 2008. Certification Date December 8, 2008. Appeal from New Hanover (05CRS59997, 05CRS60003, 05CRS60006, 05CRS60007, 05CRS60010, 05CRS60302, 05CRS60305, 06CRS714).

Case reported without published opinion. Vacated as to 05CRS59997, 05CRS60305, 05CRS60003. No Prejudicial Error as to Habitual Felon. Remaining Charges Remanded for Resentencing.
